testsuite.name: Oleksandr Makaryshyn 50 Bug Reports
testsuite.details: Test suite contains 50 test cases, which result in  failure in a certain website functionality

testcase.name: Checking the price list download feature (for a non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the possibility of price list downloading from https://radiodetali.com.ua/
testcase.preconditions:
The site https://radiodetali.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user is logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "СКАЧАТЬ ПРАЙС ЛИСТ" button in the header
step.expectedresults: The price list in ".xls" file format is downloading

step.actions: Go to the downloaded file folder and open the file
step.expectedresults: The file opens and contains the price list of the goods in stock at a current date

testcase.name: Website registration with invalid data
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the registration possibility while leaving mandatory fields blank except email
testcase.preconditions:
The site https://radiodetali.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user is logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Регистрация" button in the header
step.expectedresults: The page is loaded as follows:

step.actions: Fill in the "Электронная почта" field with the following: test@test.com
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Tick the Captcha checkbox and leave "Пароль", "Повторный пароль", "Фамилия", "Имя", "Отчество", "Телефон для связи", "Город" fileds blank.
step.expectedresults: The Captcha checkbox was verified

step.actions: Click on the button "Зарегистрироваться" below
step.expectedresults: The button changed its colour to light-red on mouse hover. The page was refreshed and the message to fill all the mandatory fields marked with (*) appeared. The registration was not successful

testcase.name: Checking the Advanced Search feature of the forum section of the website
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the functioning of the Advanced Search feature of the forum section of the website http://chip.biz.ua

step.actions: Click on the "Форум" button on the start page
step.expectedresults:
The dedicated page with the forum sections is loaded.

The sections are:

  • Personal PC configurations
  • PCs and components
  • Servers and server equipment
  • Peripherals
  • Networking
  • Software
  • Surveillance cameras
  • Search field with the "Go" button
  • The Advanced Search button
  • Latest Messages section on the right

step.actions: Click on the "Advanced Search" button below the Search field
step.expectedresults:
The Advanced Search section appeared under the Search field.

This section contains the following fields:

  • Search by author
  • Search by date
  • Search in Forum (with the main forum sections to select)
  • Keyword Search
  • Sort results by
  • Start Search button

step.actions: Type the "cooler" in the Keyword Search field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the Start Search button
step.expectedresults: The button is highlighted on the mouse hover. The new page containing the search results appeared

step.actions: Scroll down the results to check whether each of them contains the word "cooler"
step.expectedresults: Every search result contains the keyword "cooler"

testcase.name: Checking the URL validation in "Аксесуари" section (for non-registered user)
testcase.summary:
The "https://khmelnychynna-avto.ukravto.ua/" website is being tested.

Current test case verifies whether the URLs in "Аксесуари" section are correct.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://khmelnychynna-avto.ukravto.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user is logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Аксесуари для автомобілів" button in the footer.
step.expectedresults: The font colour of the button has changed to light-blue on mouse hover. The page entitled "Аксесуари" has been loaded.

step.actions: Click on the "Smart" button in the "Аксесуари" section.
step.expectedresults:
The page containing the available accessories for the Smart is opened. 

The page consists of the following sections:

  • Зовнішні аксесуари
  • Внутрішні аксесуари
  • Чохли для зберігання запасних коліс

testcase.name: Checking the functionality of "Пошук по сайту" field (for non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the functionality of the "Пошук по сайту" field.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://khmelnychynna-avto.ukravto.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the footer and type "Mercedes" in the "Пошук по сайту" field.
step.expectedresults: The "Пошук по сайту" field accepted entered data.

step.actions: Click on the magnifier icon on the right to start a search.
step.expectedresults: The page with the search results has been opened.

step.actions: Scroll down the results to check whether each of them contains the keyword "Mercedes".
step.expectedresults: Every search result contains the keyword "Mercedes".

step.actions: Clear the search field and type "ЗАЗ".
step.expectedresults: The "Пошук по сайту" field accepted entered data.

step.actions: Click on the magnifier icon on the right to start a search.
step.expectedresults: The page with the search results has been opened.

step.actions: Scroll down the results to check whether each of them contains the keyword "ЗАЗ".
step.expectedresults: Every search result contains the keyword "ЗАЗ".

testcase.name: Checking the Login functioning of the website (for registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies functioning of the Login feature of the website http://steelhammer.com.ua/
testcase.preconditions:
The page http://steelhammer.com.ua/ is loaded.

The user has previously registered with the following credentials:

Email: scrumpy@i.ua

Password: testpassword

No user is currently logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Вход" button in the header to log in the system.
step.expectedresults: The Login page is loaded as follows:

step.actions: Fill the login credentials in the "E-mail" and "Пароль:" fields
step.expectedresults: The fields accepted entered credentials

step.actions: Click on the "Войти" button on the right.
step.expectedresults: The start page for registered users is loaded:

testcase.name: Checking the "Поиск" field functioning (for non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the "Поиск" field functioning of the http://steelhammer.com.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page http://steelhammer.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Поиск" field and type the keyword "гитара".
step.expectedresults: The field accepts entered data. The page is displayed as follows:

step.actions: Click on the magnifier button on the right to start search.
step.expectedresults: The page with the search results appeared.

step.actions: Scroll down the results to check whether each of them contains the word "гитара".
step.expectedresults: Every search result contains the keyword "гитара".

testcase.name: Checking the "Гарантия и возврат" page functioning (for non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the presence of the information about the warranty and return conditions on the corresponging page of the https://electro-market.com.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://electro-market.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Гарантия и возврат" page in the footer
step.expectedresults:
The button is highlighted in grey on mouse hover.

The page with the warranty and return conditions is loaded.

The content of the page corresponds to the requirement which is applied to the given page.

testcase.name: Checking the password recovery of the "Смотрите также" subsection of the "Новости и обзоры" section
testcase.summary:
Current test case checks the password recovery feature on the https://www.avtoradosti.com.ua/ website.

The password recovery button is located in the "Смотрите также" subsection of the "Новости и обзоры" section.
testcase.preconditions:
The user is registered.

The page https://www.avtoradosti.com.ua/ is loaded.

Initially no user should be logged in.

Click on the "Новости и обзоры" button in the header. The page is loaded as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Восстановить пароль" hyperlink in the "Смотрите также" subsection.
step.expectedresults:
The hyperlink changes to grey on mouse hover.

The page is loaded.

step.actions: Enter the email in the email field previously used for registration.
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Восстановить пароль" button below.
step.expectedresults:
The button changes its color to light-green on mouse hover.

The following message appears: "На ваш почтовый ящик было отправлено письмо с параметрами доступа к своему личному кабинету."

step.actions: Check the email inbox messages for the password recovery message and follow the steps specified.
step.expectedresults: The message has been received, new password has been set.

step.actions: Log in the system with newly created password.
step.expectedresults: Log in was successful, the system accepted new password.

testcase.name: Checking the incorrect email input when subscribing to the newsletter (for non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case checks if the system accepts incorrect email when subscribing to the newsletter on the https://www.mobilluck.com.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://www.mobilluck.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the footer of the page and enter the incorrectly written email: "test@mailserver" in the newsletter field "Введите электронный адрес".
step.expectedresults: The newsletter field accepted entered data.

step.actions: Click on the "Подписаться" button
step.expectedresults: New pop-up window for subscription confirmation appeared:

step.actions: Enter the "Jack" in the "Имя" field
step.expectedresults: The "Имя" field accepted entered data.

step.actions: Click on the "Отправить" button below to submit entered data.
step.expectedresults:
The "Отправить" button turns to dark-blue on the mouse hover.

The message with the incorrect email input appeared.

testcase.name: Checking the correct language of the "Інформація" section links
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the correct website language of the links in the "Інформація" section.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://omega.km.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

The default website language is Ukrainian.

There is no option to change the language.

step.actions: Click on the "Про нас" hyperlink in the footer:
step.expectedresults:
The hyperlink changes its color to white on mouse hover.

The page "Про нас" displays in Ukrainian.

step.actions:
Repeat step 1 for the rest of the links:

  • Завантажити ПО
  • Наші проекти
  • Контакти
  • Зворотній зв'язок
  • Мапа сайту
step.expectedresults:
The hyperlinks change their color to white on mouse hover.

All the corresponding pages display in Ukrainian.

testcase.name: Checking the left menu panel functionality (for a non-registered user)
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the whether the left sliding panel contains the web camera links, collected by groups.
testcase.preconditions:
The page http://glazok.km.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Click on the left menu panel button as marked below:
step.expectedresults: The panel slides to the right opening a list of web cameras grouped by city districts

testcase.preconditions:
The page https://specinstrument.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the footer an click on the "Оплата и доставка" link.
step.expectedresults: The "Оплата и доставка" page opens:

step.actions: Click on the "Гарантия" link
step.expectedresults: The "Гарантия" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Статьи" link
step.expectedresults: The "Статьи" page opens as follows:

step.actions: CLick on the "Новости" link
step.expectedresults: The "Новости" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Личный кабинет" link
step.expectedresults: The "Личный кабинет" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Помощь" link
step.expectedresults: The "Помощь" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Контакты" link
step.expectedresults: The "Контакты" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Вопрос / ответ" link
step.expectedresults: The "Вопрос / ответ" page opens as follows:

step.actions: Click on the "Регистрация / авторизация" link
step.expectedresults: The "Регистрация / авторизация" page opens as follows:

testcase.name: Incorrect email input while subscribing to newsletter
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies whether it is possible to subscribe to newsletter entering incorrect email.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://deshevshe.net.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the "Подписка на новые скидки и промокоды" section in the footer and type the email: test@mailserver
step.expectedresults: The field accepted written data

step.actions: Click on the "Подписаться" button on the right
step.expectedresults:
The button changes its colour to light-yellow on mouse hover.

The subscription was declined by the system as the email does not satisfy the address format requirements.

testcase.name: Checking the "Мобильный форум" link functionality
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the "Мобильный форум" link functionality on the http://pc-center.com.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page http://pc-center.com.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Click on the "Мобильный форум" link in the "Компьютерный форум" section.
step.expectedresults:
The link changes its colour from blue to red on mouse hover.

The page "Мобильный форум" is opened containing the sections devoted to the cell phones topic.

testcase.name: Checking the "Пошта" button functionality
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the "Пошта" button functionality on the https://trolley.org.ua/ website.

step.actions: Click on the "Пошта" button in the header:
step.expectedresults:
The letters receive a black outline on mouse hover.

The page http://webmail.trolley.org.ua/ opens in new window and contains a webmail service.

testcase.name: Checking the "Графіки" button functionality
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the "Графіки" button functionality on the https://trolley.org.ua/ website.

step.actions: Click on the "Графіки" button in the header:
step.expectedresults:
The letters receive a black outline on mouse hover.

A "rozklad.xls" file from https://trolley.org.ua/docs/ automatically starts downloading. The file contains a trolley time schedule.

testcase.name: Checking the links from the "Ресурси" dropdown menu
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the transition of the links from the "Ресурси" dropdown menu.

step.actions: Go to the header and hover on the "Ресурси" button
step.expectedresults: A dropdown menu should appear:

step.actions: Choose "Депо "Гречани"" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "Депо "Гречани"" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "Хмельницька Міська Рада" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "Хмельницька Міська Рада" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "МКП Хмельницькводоканал" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "МКП Хмельницькводоканал" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "Теплокомуненерго" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "Теплокомуненерго" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "Південно-Західні тепломережі" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "Південно-Західні тепломережі" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "ХКП Спецкомунтранс" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "ХКП Спецкомунтранс" is displayed

step.actions: Choose "ПАТ Хмельницькгаз" from the menu
step.expectedresults: The page with the information concerning "ХПАТ Хмельницькгаз" is displayed

testcase.name: Checking the "Пункти продажу квитків" button functionality
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies the "Пункти продажу квитків" button functionality on the https://trolley.org.ua/ website.

step.actions: Hover on the "Інформація про діяльність" button
step.expectedresults: The letters receive a black outline. The "Пункти продажу квитків" button drops down.

step.actions: Click on the "Пункти продажу квитків" button
step.expectedresults:
The button turns into dark-blue on mouse hover and the letters receive black outline.

A list of ticket sales points opens in new window.

testcase.name: Checking the links from the "Державні та інші сайти" side section.
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the transition of the links from the "Державні та інші сайти" side section of the https://trolley.org.ua/ website.

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Президент України" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Президент України" website is displayed

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Верховна Рада України" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Верховна Рада України" website is displayed

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Кабінет Міністрів України" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Кабінет Міністрів України" website is displayed

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Конституційний Суд України" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Конституційний Суд України" website is displayed

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Депо Гречани" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Депо Гречани" website is displayed

step.actions: Go to the "Державні та інші сайти" side section and click on the "Хмельницька міська рада" link
step.expectedresults: The start page of the "Хмельницька міська рада" website is displayed

step.actions: Click on the "Детальніше..." button of the message entitled "До уваги хмельничан! 24 листопада у мікрорайоні Гречани тимчасово не курсуватимуть тролейбуси"

step.expectedresults: Each time new page with the corresponding message opens.

step.actions: Click on the "Форум" button in the header:

The letters receive a black outline on mouse hover.

The page https://forum.trolley.org.ua/ opens in new window and contains the forum topics.

testcase.name: Checking the newsletter subscription on the https://winetime.com.ua/ website

step.expectedresults: The message of successful subscription is displayed

The page https://winetime.com.ua/ is loaded

testcase.name: Incorrect email input when subscribing to newsletter on the "salon-astoria.com" website
testcase.summary: Current test case verifies whether the system accepts incorrect email when subscribing to newsletter on the https://salon-astoria.com/ website.

step.expectedresults: A pop-up window for the subscription appeared:

testcase.name: Checking the "ЖЖУК-Сервіс" link functionality

step.expectedresults: The corresponding page containing the information on service and repair is opened

testcase.name: Checking if the price of the boots is correctly displayed
testcase.summary: Current test case checks whether the the price for the children boots is correctly displayed
testcase.preconditions:
Go to the https://litma.com.ua/

Click on the "ДИТЯЧЕ" button in the header.

Then click on the "ПЕРЕГЛЯНУТИ" of the "ГУМОВІ ЧОБІТКИ 23-26" section.

The following page opens:

step.actions: Scroll down the page and check if the price is set for all of the items.
step.expectedresults: The price is set for all of the items on the page

testcase.name: Creating account with incorrect credentials
testcase.summary: Current test case checks the possibility of creating an account with incorrect phone number and email
testcase.preconditions:
Go to the https://litma.com.ua/

Click on the account icon on the top-right:

The following page is opened. Click on the "Реєстрація" button

step.actions: Click on the "Ім'я" field and type "test"
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Прізвище" field and type "test" and leave "Роздріб" field unchanged.
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Телефон" field and type the following number: 000-000-00-00
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Email" field and type "test@test"
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Пароль" field and type "Password1234"
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "ЗАРЕЄСТРУВАТИСЬ" button below
step.expectedresults: The system declined the registration with a message that the phone number and the email fields contain incorrect data

testcase.name: Leaving a feedback on the website without entering the email
testcase.summary: Current test case checks if the system will accept the email field blank when leaving a feedback

step.actions: Click on the "Відгуки" button in the header
step.expectedresults:
The letters of the button turn into green on mouse hover.

The page "Відгуки" is opened

step.actions: Go to the "Залишити відгук" section and type "Олександр" in the "Ім'я" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Leave the email field blank and tick the fifth star on the stars icon
step.expectedresults: The stars turn into green on mouse hover. The star was selected.

step.actions: Enter the following message in the "Повідомлення" field: "Взуття дуже сподобалось. Наступного разу обов'язково замовлю ще раз"
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Відправити" button below
step.expectedresults: The system did not send the message showing that the email field must contain an email address

testcase.name: Checking the shop location functionality on "Адреси наших магазинів" page
testcase.summary: The test case checks if the "Адреси наших магазинів" page displays the shop location correctly

step.actions: Click on the "Адреси наших магазинів" link in the footer
step.expectedresults: A page with the shop location and the Google map is opened

step.actions: Click on the city "Київ" on the left
step.expectedresults: The map with exact shop location in Kyiv is opened

step.actions: Click on the city "Вінниця" on the left
step.expectedresults: The map with exact shop location in Vinnytsia is opened

step.actions: Click on the city "Тернопіль" on the left
step.expectedresults: The map with exact shop location in Ternopil is opened

testcase.name: Checking the link "Перелік послуг" functionality in the header menu
testcase.summary: The test case checks if the header menu link "Перелік послуг" is working properly on the https://hoe.com.ua/ website

step.actions: Go to the header and hover on the "Товари, послуги" menu:
step.expectedresults: The dropdown menu appears on mouse hover

step.actions: Click on the "Перелік послуг" link from the dropdown menu
step.expectedresults: The page describing the service list is opened

testcase.name: Checking the language switching slider in the header
testcase.summary: The test case checks whether the graphic slider moves to English when switching the language on the https://hoe.com.ua/ website

step.actions: Go to header and switch the interface language to English
step.expectedresults:
The link turns into orange on mouse hover.

The graphic slider moved towards "Eng".

The interface language is switched to English.

testcase.name: Checking the "Поповнення" button functionality after recharging the account
testcase.summary: The test case checks if the "Поповнення" button works in the window that comes after the account recharge on the https://kyivstar.ua/ website
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://kyivstar.ua/ is loaded.

Go to the header and click on the "Поповнення" button.

Enter valid mobile number or the account number to recharge.

Enter the amount for a recharge.

Enter valid credit card number, validity date and CVV2 code in the corresponding fields.

Click on the "Поповнити" button below.

Enter the security code sent in the SMS.

Confirm the code entered.

The page with a successful recharge is displayed.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Поповнення" button on the right:
step.expectedresults: The recharge page is opened:

testcase.name: Checking the "Події" link functionality in the header menu
testcase.summary: The test case checks if the "Події" link in the header menu is valid on the https://km.ukravtodor.gov.ua/ website

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Прес-центр" menu
step.expectedresults:
The "Прес-центр" menu is highlighted in blue on mouse hover.

A dropdown menu is opened:

step.actions: Click on the "Події" link
step.expectedresults: The page dedicated to the "Події" topic is opened.

testcase.name: Checking the validity of the links in the footer on https://partner-tour.com/
testcase.summary: Test case verifies whether all the links in the footer are valid on the https://partner-tour.com/ website

step.actions: Go to the footer and click on the "Календар турів" link
step.expectedresults:
The link changes its colour to orange on mouse hover.

The page concerning "Календар турів" is opened.

step.actions:
Repeat step 1 for the rest of the links:

  • Прокат спорядження
  • Туристам
  • Блог
  • Відгуки
  • Про нас
  • Контакти
  • Пошук турів
  • Квитки Авіа / Потяг / Автобус
  • Фотогалерея
  • Подарунковий сертифікат
  • Система знижок
step.expectedresults: After clicking on the link, the corresponding page opens containing the information on the topic.

testcase.name: Creating an account on the https://zolotoyvek.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Test case verifies the possibility to create an account on the https://zolotoyvek.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://zolotoyvek.ua/ is loaded.

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the account icon on the right:
step.expectedresults: A pop-up window for login/registration is opened

step.actions: Go to the bottom and click on the "Реєстрація" button
step.expectedresults: A new pop-up page for the registration is opened:

step.actions: Type "test" in the "Ім'я" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Type "test" in the "Прізвище" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Enter "scrumpy@i.ua" in the "Email" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Enter the password "Testpassword1234*" and re-enter it in the field below
step.expectedresults: Both fields accepted entered data

step.actions: Check the "Запам'ятати мене" checkbox
step.expectedresults: The checkbox was checked

step.actions: Check the reCAPTCHA box
step.expectedresults: reCAPTCHA verification successfully passed

step.actions: Click on the "Створити акаунт" button
step.expectedresults: A message with a successful account creation appeared

testcase.name: Checking the "Отзывы" link validity on the https://detailcar.com.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Current test case checks if the "Отзывы" link opens an appropriate page on the https://detailcar.com.ua/ website

step.actions: Go to the footer and click on the "Отзывы" link
step.expectedresults:
The "Отзывы" link turns into green on mouse hover.

The corresponding page containing the testimonials is opened

testcase.name: Checkout with incorrect phone number
testcase.summary: Test case checks whether it is possible to checkout with an incorrect phone number on the https://jabko.ua/ website.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "б/у Apple" button:
step.expectedresults: A page with used phones opened.

step.actions: Hover on the "б/у iPhone 11 Pro 64GB" item
step.expectedresults: "Швидка покупка" and "Купити" menu appeared.

step.actions: Click on the "Купити" button:
step.expectedresults: A checkout page opened.

step.actions:
Enter "test" in the "Ім'я" field

Enter "000-000-00-00" in the "Телефон" field

Leave the email field empty
step.expectedresults: The fields accepted entered data.

step.actions:
In the "Доставка і оплата" section:

Select "Самовивіз із магазину"

Select "Вінниця"

Select "ТРЦ Скай Парк"

Select "Оплата готівкою"
step.expectedresults: The corresponding parameters were successfully selected

step.actions: Click on the "Оформити замовлення" button
step.expectedresults: An error concerning incorrect phone number input appeared. Checkout is not completed.

testcase.name: Checking the registration link functionality on the https://www.oboibum.com.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Test case checks whether the registration link opens a page with corresponding registration fields on the https://www.oboibum.com.ua/ website.
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://www.oboibum.com.ua/ is loaded

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Войти" link
step.expectedresults:
The link turns into red on mouse hover.

A "Мой аккаунт" page is loaded containing login fields and a registration link.

step.actions: Click on the "Регистрация" link.
step.expectedresults: The registration page is loaded containing the corresponding registration fields.

testcase.name: Checking the localization functionality of the https://mbocharova.com.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Test case verifies whether the localization to Ukrainian is functioning on the https://mbocharova.com.ua/ website.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Укр" link.
step.expectedresults:
The link is underlined on mouse hover.

The website changed the display language to Ukrainian.

testcase.name: Checking the subsidiaries location of the http://cukiernia.com.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Test case checks the subsidiaries location on the "Контакти" link of the http://cukiernia.com.ua/ website.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Контакти" button.
step.expectedresults:
The button changed its color to red on mouse hover.

The page "Контакти" is opened.

step.actions: Go to the L'viv subsidiary and theck the map location.
step.expectedresults: The map is showing 3 Staroyevreys'ka street location

step.actions: Go to the Khmel'nyts'kyy subsidiary and theck the map location.
step.expectedresults: The map is showing 45 Proskurivs'ka street location

step.actions: Go to the Ivano-Frankivs'k subsidiary and theck the map location.
step.expectedresults: The map is showing 12 Nezalezhnosti street location

step.actions: Go to the Vinnytsia subsidiary and theck the map location.
step.expectedresults: The map is showing 28 Hrushevs'koho street location

testcase.name: Subscribing to a newsletter with an incorrect email
testcase.summary: Test case checks whether it is possible to subscribe to a newsletter with an incorrect email on the https://www.atbmarket.com/uk website

step.actions:
Go to the bottom to the "ПІДПИШІТЬСЯ НА РОЗСИЛКУ" section.

Enter an incorrect email "test@mailserver" in the corresponding field:
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Підписатися" button
step.expectedresults: You will be transferred to a new page where previously written email is in the email field:

step.actions: Type "test" in the "Ваше ім'я" field
step.expectedresults: The field aacepted entered data

step.actions: Type "test" in the "Ваше прізвище" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "НАДІСЛАТИ" button below
step.expectedresults:
The button becomes dark-grey on mouse hover.

A message of incorrectly written email is displayed.

testcase.name: Website registration with incorrect phone number
testcase.summary: Test case checks whether it is possible to register with an incorrect phone number on the https://megasport.ua/ website

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the login icon:
step.expectedresults: A page "Вхід / реєстрація" is loaded:

step.actions: Type the number "(000) 000 00 00" in the "Мобільний телефон" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "УВІЙТИ" button
step.expectedresults:
The button turns into dark-orange on mouse hover.

The message appears that the phone number is entered incorrectly.

testcase.name: Website registration when the email is optional
testcase.summary: Test case checks website registration without entering an email (email is optional) on the https://fishunter.com.ua/
testcase.preconditions:
The page https://fishunter.com.ua/ is loaded

User is not registered. No user should be logged in.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Личный кабинет" link:
step.expectedresults: A dropdown menu appeared:

step.actions: Click on the "Регистрация" link from the dropdown menu
step.expectedresults:
The link turns into orange on mouse hover.

A page with a registration fields is opened.

step.actions: In the "Имя" field enter "test"
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions:
In the "Фамилия" field enter "test".

As the email field is optional, leave it empty.
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Enter "050-123-45-67" in the "Телефон" field
step.expectedresults: The field accepted entered data

step.actions: Enter "12345678" in the "Пароль" and "Подтвердите пароль" fields.
step.expectedresults: The fields accepted entered data

step.actions: Click on the "Продолжить" button
step.expectedresults: The page with a successful registration is opened.

testcase.name: Checking the localization functionality of the https://fishunter.com.ua/ website
testcase.summary: Test case verifies whether the localization to Ukrainian is functioning on the https://fishunter.com.ua/ website.

step.actions: Go to the header and click on the "Укр" button.
step.expectedresults:
The button turned to orange on mouse hover.

The website changed the display language to Ukrainian.
